title: Let it go: Mental breaks after work improve sleep

title_detail.value: Let it go: Mental breaks after work improve sleep

summary: If you've had a bad day at work thanks to rude colleagues, doing something fun and relaxing after you punch out could net you a better night's sleep.

summary_detail.value: If you've had a bad day at work thanks to rude colleagues, doing something fun and relaxing after you punch out could net you a better night's sleep.
